price: (Nkͻmhyεni), wͻrebisa wo fa mmepͻ nso ho asεm. Ka sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn bɛbubu no gͻsͻgͻsͻ atu apete sε mfuturo.
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
